translation:
Piratini, December 9, 1838. Most Illustrious Sir

I acknowledge receipt of your letter of the 3rd of the current month and in response to the same I inform you that tomorrow the required orders will be issued.

God keep Your Lordship Secretary of the Treasury in Piratini, December 9, 1838. Most Illustrious Sir João Antônio da Silveira, Commander of the Right Division. Domingos José de Almeida
